channel.title: Home areas you'd like to see?
channel.description:
I'm currently working on a new project, and have the home based in Edgeville. I [b]hate[/b] Edgeville.
I would like to know what home locations that you, as players, would like to see on a server. Something small, tight nit, and close together?
or
A large open area, utilizing buildings, requiring small amounts of running?
What cities would you like to see people begin to use? Post your ideas below. :P

item.title: Home areas you'd like to see?
item.dc:creator: @Togasa Togasa
item.description:
@Togasa wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:21, topic:465927”][quote author=Togasa link=topic=573110.msg4146166#msg4146166 date=1352214990]

I like Yanille as home.

^^ the best
[/quote]

I disagree. I hate the way most people lay it out for a home… It just doesn’t work imo.[/quote]
nuff said ^^ I’m not most ppl.

Read full topic

item.title: Home areas you'd like to see?
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:18, topic:465927”][quote author=Tutorial link=topic=573110.msg4144264#msg4144264 date=1352133292]

A good made custom map, alot of details in it, enough buildings for shops/bank etc

Exactly, every city such as edgeville, lumbridge, etc. have all been used. If you want to stand out, you may want to consider creating your own areas, as that’s the best way to ensure originality.

Sorry, but I wouldn’t play a server that had any custom content such as that.
[/quote]You don’t play servers due to originality?[/quote]

I understand originality, but making an entire city that I’ve never seen before, hoping to increase player count doesn’t seem like it’s worth it. Maybe as an update as players join. I like a small quaint town. Anyone know any? I will check the desert place this afternoon.

Read full topic
item.source: Home areas you'd like to see?

item.title: Home areas you'd like to see?
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

personalty Edgeville is just a overused, yet bad-ass place to be, but if i could change a nice home I would pick Falador just because it has a nice garden and has a great castle where you can let it be only donators, mods, admins, and owners can go into, but at the same time find a secret place for your staff and donators to hangout.

Read full topic

item.title: Home areas you'd like to see?
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

So you want someone to custom make a map, even though they will be NOTHING like the ones that Jagex has created because we have shitty versions of the real map makers?

How would a thrown together map be better than a map that is already made?

I like the idea, I just don’t know how it would look…

Read full topic
